title: Rig arrives in Canada ready to ignite key exploration campaign
Content: Rig arrives in Canada ready to launch key exploration campaign | Upstream                                                                                                                               Exploration Rig arrives in Canada ready to launch key exploration campaign Hercules semisub will drill two wells for EquinorHercules drilling rig arrives in Bay Bulls in Newfoundland & Labrador, Canada.Photo: ROB STRONG Iain Esau Africa CorrespondentLondon   EquinorCanadaNewfoundland & Labrador Be notified Published 3 July 2024, 13:57Updated 3 July 2024, 16:06
